mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Only three members of Board of Visitors met yesterday; was opinion that reading room was not necessary; subjects prescribed by law in hands of professors; others not necessary and not according to law; would be distraction; buildings for education cannot be permitted for other purposes.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1825 December 14, Monticello, [Albemarle County, Virginia] to John B. Richeson, n.p.
